concept.title: About the Shanks Computer Labs
concept.shortdesc: This describes the spaces that are for rent through this service.

conbody.p: Shanks Hall is located on the "Upper Quad" of campus, at the heart of the University's original site. Just across the green is Lane Hall, the oldest building on campus, and all around us are dormitories for Virginia Tech's Corps of Cadets. Shanks is a converted office building that houses two of Virginia Tech's departments-- Communications and English. Rooms 360 and 180 are dedicated classroom spaces filled with Apple desktops, perfect for any level of user.

Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, most commonly known at Virginia Tech, is located in Blacksburg, Virginia. Established in 1872 as part of President Lincoln's Land Grant University system, Virginia Tech has had a long tradition of innovation and technical education. Virginia Tech is a public university, and attracts students from all over the world.
